page.title: 09TRADE IN DEEPCAR/WHARNCLIFFE
page.content: {FOOD SHOPS}There are 5 general grocers, 1 fish and chip shop, 1 butcher and 1 freezer centre in Deepcar.{NON FOOD SHOPS}consist of 2 newsagents, 1 post office, 1 gift shop, 2 garages, 2 hairdressers, 1 TV repair, 1 video hire, 1 aquatic, 1 hire equipment, 1 garden centre, 1 funeral director, 1 second hand clothes and 1 babywear shop. {Mobile Shops}3 vehicles serve the area: 1 butcher, 1 baker and 1 green- grocer. Residents of the{WHARNCLIFFE area must travel to Chapeltown/Stocksbridge (both 3 mls.) for most of their food shopping. Asda{Supermarket(Chapeltown) have free bus services including one via Wortley to Deepcar & Stocksbridge (3 buses, Tuesdays only). Other shopping is at Hillsborough (North Sheffield), Sheffield and Barnsley.
